Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Sheridan/Lawrence
ShortDescription: Northbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Lawrence, Marine Dr., Foster, then resume their normal route on Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Lawrence, Marine Dr., Foster, then resume their normal route on Sheridan, due to street blockage near Sheridan/Lawrence.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
